values: To insulate something means to protect it from heat, cold, or noise.
People can conserve energy by insulating their houses.
v. to keep separate from something unpleasant, dangerous, etc. 隔离，绝缘（不利的东西）
vt. 隔离，使孤立；使绝缘，使隔热

vt. 隔离，使孤立；[物]使绝缘，使隔热


时 态:  
insulated, insulating, insulates
